src.config package

Submodules

src.config.Config module

class src.config.Config.Config(config_file_path)[source]

Bases: object

get_gpu()[source]

Returns: the gpu list as a string

get_models_list(origin_of_elaboration, type_of_extraction)[source]
Parameters:

  • origin_of_elaboration – ‘items’ or ‘interactions’

  • type_of_extraction – ‘textual’, ‘visual’ or ‘audio’

Returns: a list of the models, every model is a dict with ‘name’: the name of the model, in same cases as transformers is repo/model name, ‘output_layers’: the layers of extraction, ‘framework’: framework to work with tensorflow/torch/transformers

and a custom flag to manage the preprocessing of the data

has_config(origin_of_elaboration, type_of_extraction)[source]

Search the config in the data dicts then check that this config have values in it :param origin_of_elaboration: ‘items’ or ‘interactions’ :param type_of_extraction: ‘textual’, ‘visual’ or ‘audio’

Returns: Bool True/False if contains the configuration

paths_for_extraction(origin_of_elaboration, type_of_extraction)[source]

Gives the working environments :param origin_of_elaboration: ‘items’ or ‘interactions’ :param type_of_extraction: ‘textual’, ‘visual’ or ‘audio’

Returns: a dict as { ‘input_path’: input path, ‘output_path’: output_path }
